content:
From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
The Derangements Formula describes the number of fixpoint-free permutations as a
closed formula. This theorem is the 88th theorem in a list of the ``Top 100
Mathematical Theorems.''

http://afp.sourceforge.net/entries/Derangements.shtml

Enjoy!
smime.p7s
